learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): The word part has more than one meaning. Choose the sentence in which part means "a p...

p.b: The word part has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the sentence in which part means "a person's specific duty or role."

simpleChoice.p: Because I cannot manage my wild hair by myself, every morning my mother uses a large comb to part it.
After a week of tryouts, Andrea found out that she had received the leading part in the play.
Jacob and Cassie went to the movies and walked in the park for an hour before they had to part ways.
My cousin went to the junkyard to get a used part to fix his car.
